room_title: Escape room "The Iron Throne" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: Did the Iron Throne room and it was fantastic and so much fun we ended up with another group of strangers and we all worked together! I can't wait to go again!

room_title: Escape room "The Iron Throne" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: Had so much fun tonight! We did the Iron Throne and were able to escape. Definitely wanting to come back and we're already planning our next trip. Thanks again for an awesome host and the staff being so welcoming.

room_title: Escape room "The Iron Throne" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: I've done three rooms with the FW Escape and I've got to say that Iron Throne was my favorite so far. Each room was challenging in its own way and I got stumped at least once. However after careful examination, we were able to continue and the experience was never disappointing and in fact left me wanting more. Their rooms are really well done, tons of fun and I highly recommend it for all.

room_title: Escape room "The Iron Throne" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: We did the Iron Throne room and it was great! First time doing an escape room and loved it. The people were awesome and our game master was super nice. Would recommend this place!

room_title: Escape room "The Iron Throne" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: Had a great time with my friends can't wait to go back! The staff was great and the Iron Throne room was tough but very fun!
